# harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_keys (Data Source)

Data source for listing GPG Signing Keys from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_keys" "all" {}

output "all_signing_keys" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_keys.all.signing_keys
}

# Filter to find a specific key by key_id
locals {
  hashicorp_key = [
    for key in data.harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_keys.all.signing_keys : key
    if key.key_id == "51852D87348FFC4C"
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `signing_keys` (List of Object) List of signing keys. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--signing_keys))

<a id="nestedatt--signing_keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `signing_keys`

Read-Only:

- `ascii_armor` (String, Sensitive) ASCII-armored GPG public key.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the signing key.
- `key_id` (String) GPG key ID.
- `key_name` (String) GPG key name.
- `updated_at` (String) Last updated timestamp.
- `user` (String) User who uploaded the key.
